meanings.definition: A device used to spray paint or ink onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: The artist used an airbrush to paint a beautiful mural on the wall.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new airbrush to help me with my art projects.
meanings.sent3: The airbrush hummed softly as it sprayed color onto the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The airbrush danced across the paper, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The airbrush made painting so much easier and faster.

meanings.definition: To alter or enhance a photograph or image using an airbrush.
meanings.sent1: She decided to airbrush the photo to remove some blemishes.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often airbrush their pictures to make them look perfect.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he wished he could airbrush his own flaws in real life.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so bright, it seemed like someone had airbrushed it on.
meanings.sent5: The artist skillfully airbrushed the portrait, bringing it to life.

meanings.definition: To remove imperfections or flaws using an airbrush.
meanings.sent1: The makeup artist used an airbrush to cover up the model's acne scars.
meanings.sent2: I need to airbrush this photo to get rid of the red-eye effect.
meanings.sent3: He wished he could airbrush away all his mistakes from the past.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness seemed to airbrush any negativity from the room.
meanings.sent5: The airbrush skillfully concealed any imperfections on the surface.
